metadata.title: CVE-2016-5011 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The parse_dos_extended function in partitions/dos.c in the libblkid libraryin util-linux allows physically proximate attackers to cause a denial ofservice (memory consumption) via a crafted MSDOS partition table with anextended partition boot record at zero offset.

criterions.comment: util-linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
